name: In Space No-One Can Hear You Jump
name_original: In Space No-One Can Hear You Jump
description:
You're stuck in space and need to get to your spaceship! But that's easier said than done when there's no gravity! Use your mouse to aim your jumps and use energy tethers to dodge asteroids and make it home safely!

Made for the 2018 Game Maker's Toolkit (GMTK) Jam. Theme was "Genre without Mechanic." We went with "Platformer without Gravity"

Currently Windows Only.

Controls:

Click, drag, and release to jump!

Click on Tethers to use them!

Pressing R Restarts if you get stuck.

Pressing F4 toggles Fullscreen.

Known Issues:

     Game crashes if you use tether while the rocket leaves the level.

Credits:

     Tony Wojnar: Lead Designer, Pixel Artist, Sound Design

     Michael Wojnar: Lead Programmer

     Sean Stewart: Assistant Programmer

     Cason Jolly: Music
